title: glitch for post game screen
body: hey i won a ranked match earlier and it bugged out so the end screen that shows stats didnt pop up, i closed the game and went to work came back 12 hours later and now i cant log in because it thinks im trying to reconnect to an on going game ive logged in and out and attemped to reconnect 5 times and it just black screens and asks if i want to attemp to reconnect again.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It sounds like you experienced a "ghost game", which is where the server doesn't properly send a message to PvP.net that the game has finished and was recorded. Typically, it shouldn't last more than a few hours at most. If you're still having this issue, please let me know.
